explains: n. 独特性；独一无二；单值性
wordGroup: uniqueness theorem 唯一性定理；单值定理

sentences.en: The author stresses the uniqueness of the individual.
sentences.cn: 这位作者强调个人的独特性。

sentences.en: The uniqueness in the architecture style of the tower makes it have no parallel in the world.
sentences.cn: 这座塔独特的建筑风格使它在世界上独一无二。

sentences.en: The Romantics commemorated the leading painters and authors of their day, stressing the uniqueness of the artist's personal experience rather than public glory.
sentences.cn: 浪漫主义是为了纪念那个时代的主要画家和作家，强调艺术家个人经历的独特性，而不是公众的荣耀。
